channel.description:
A recently-built application is a good example of MESGâ€™s extreme versatility. It connects a website to multiple cryptocurrencies and a satellite, to securely send messages from space.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/use-case-send-messages-from-space/
